bug.author: shuokay
bug.summary: [bug report] convert_imageset with -g option to convert images data to lmdb data
bug.description:
I did not find the bug report page, so I report it here. If anyone know the bug report page, please kindly tell me and I will move this report there. I use convert_iamgeset to convert images data to lmdb format data with-g flag and failed , here is the output: <denchmark-code>~] time ~/ocr/caffe-dev/build/tools/convert_imageset -g ./ test.list test.lmdb 1 lmdb 16 80 F0804 11:08:30.133080 5572 convert_imageset.cpp:112] Check failed: mdb_env_open(mdb_env, argv[3], 0, 0664) == 0 (20 vs. 0) mdb_env_open failed *** Check failure stack trace: *** @ 0x7fc26a249b7d google::LogMessage::Fail() @ 0x7fc26a24bc7f google::LogMessage::SendToLog() @ 0x7fc26a24976c google::LogMessage::Flush() @ 0x7fc26a24c51d google::LogMessageFatal::~LogMessageFatal() @ 0x413099 main @ 0x7fc26727f76d (unknown) @ 0x413eed (unknown) Aborted (core dumped) </denchmark-code>
If drop the-g option, everything goes well.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/weinman>@weinman</denchmark-link> as the contributor of the grayscale flag to the tools, have you had any trouble with grayscale inputs and lmdb storage?

I haven't had a problem because I haven't pulled in a while, but I believe I can see the issue. While the current version of the dev branch has the mdb_env_open call on lines 113-114, rather than 112, as shown in the stack trace, it looks like <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mavenlin>@mavenlin</denchmark-link> forgot to use arg_offset in the argv indexing. The argument should be argv[arg_offset+3].
(maybe a good time to move to gflags? :))

Perhaps so. I'm not opposed but I don't have time now to do it myself. If additional flags/options get added to the program, then definitely so. On Aug 8, 2014, at 1:08 AM, Yangqing Jia wrote:
